sources.title: Mrs. O'Leary's Cow (1938)
sources.description: Mrs. O'Leary's cow is brought to the witness stand in court to explain how she started a great fire. Her testimony fades into a very routine fire brigade cartoon.It has little to do with the Chicago conflagration she's famous for. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/mrs-olearys-cow-1938/

metadata.Plot: Mrs. O'Leary's cow is brought to the witness stand in court to explain how she started a great fire. Her testimony fades into a very routine fire brigade cartoon.It has little to do with the Chicago conflagration she's famous for.
